body.name: LITIFO Single Serve Coffee Maker for Ground coffee, Tea & K Cup Pod, 2-In-1 Small Coffee Machine with 6 to 14oz Reservoir, One-Button Fast Brew, Auto Shut-off & Self Cleaning Function (Green)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【2 In 1 Single Cup Coffee Maker】 Whether you like to make a coffee with k cup pods or coffee ground, this coffee brewer can brew the ultimate delicious coffee. And the small coffee maker fits most of capsules. Fit 6oz to 14oz mug, meet the different coffee drinking habits of you or your family.

【One-Button Control & Auto Shut-Off Function】Simple one-touch button makes it easy to brew your favorite coffee. Preparing ground coffee or capsules/pods, add water, press button, then auto shut-off after brewing, which ensures safety. Powerful 1000W fast brew technology ensures coffee brews in 3 minutes.

【Compact and Portable】With the most compact design and durable construction in the market, the one cup coffee maker is perfect for home, office, apartment, caravan, etc. And it is light-weight. Whenever and wherever, our coffee maker will save your time, and delivers you a delicious cup of coffee.

【Easy to Clean】Cleanup is easy, just carry out 2 or 3 circles with cold water only to clean the device before brewing the first cup of coffee or after several using times. With removable capsule shells and filter, there's no mess left about cleaning.

【Warm Tips】 Be sure to add water into water tank before press the button to brew coffee. The mini coffee maker can only be used under US standard voltage. A voltage transformer is needed when you use it in other countries.
body.description: LITIFO Single Serve Coffee Maker Our single serve coffee maker, perfect for k cup and ground coffee, can meet the most widely uses, you can use this portable small coffee maker for various occasions, and brew a standard-size cup of coffee, start your day and enjoy the best convenience for your schedule. PACKAGE INCLUDS: 1 x Single Serve Coffee Maker 1 x Removable Drip 1 x Reusable filter 1 x Instruction Manual Note : Mug and capsules are NOT included. ATTENTION： If you receive the wrong product, please take a picture of the outer packaging with the product label as well as a picture of the product and contact me directly, I will deal with the relevant issues, thank you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LITIFO Single Serve Coffee Maker Our single serve coffee maker, perfect for k cup and ground coffee, can meet the most widely uses, you can use this portable small coffee maker for various occasions, and brew a standard-size cup of coffee, start your day and enjoy the best convenience for your schedule. PACKAGE INCLUDS: 1 x Single Serve Coffee Maker 1 x Removable Drip 1 x Reusable filter 1 x Instruction Manual Note : Mug and capsules are NOT included. ATTENTION： If you receive the wrong product, please take a picture of the outer packaging with the product label as well as a picture of the product and contact me directly, I will deal with the relevant issues, thank you! SPECIFICATIONS: Power: 1000W Voltage: 110V-120V Water Tank: 6oz-14oz Size: 7.3"L*5.4"W*11.6"H Color: green

One-Button Control & Auto Shut-Off Function Simple one-touch button makes it easy to brew your favorite coffee. Preparing ground coffee or k cup capsules/pods, add water, press button, then auto shut-off after brewing, which ensures safety. FAST & FRESH BREWED 1000W fast brew technology ensures coffee brews quickly and at the perfect temperature just in 3 minutes. Compact and Tiny Design Not only brew coffee in the kitchen.Our coffee maker is much smaller than other coffee machines. You can place it in a narrow place such as a kitchen countertop or desk.

Kindly Tips From LITIFO: 1. Fill the water tank only with cold water 2. Please clean the water tank and filter for the first use or after using for a long time 3. When adding coffee grounds in the basket do not exceed the MAX line. DO NOT add more than 14oz water into the water reservoir. 4. For your use safety, when the coffee machine is brewing, do not open the lid. 5. ONLY can be used under USA voltage standard 110V-120V, if used in other countries please be sure there is a voltage converter.

Single Serve Coffee Maker Coffee Maker with Milk Frother Burr Coffee Grinder Blade Coffee Maker Capacity 6-14 oz 30 oz 2-12cups 2 oz Color Black Black Black White Dimensions 7.3x5.4x11.6 in 9.4 x 5.9 x 14.2 In 7.1x4.7x11 in 3.9x3.5x6.7 in Compatibility For Tea, K Cup Pods & Ground Coffee For Tea, K Cup Pods, Ground Coffee, Latte and Cappuccino Coffee Beans Coffee Beans, Spices, Nuts and Grains

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use very compact
reviews.reviewText: So I agree it does feel cheaply made but it’s gets the job done I also agree that you need to how many ounces of water you will like to use because it will literally run until the water is all gone also don’t put the water in after you turn the coffee maker on make sure your cup is in place first next add your water and your k cup close and then turn on because it immediately starts to brew I’m not a fan of the little black coffee catcher but I get the purpose just not used to a coffee maker being so small I had to get this because my kuerig died on me but anyways it brews Farley quickly and it comes out nice and hot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works good great for in the camper doesn’t take up a lot of room to store
reviews.reviewText: My husband only drinks coffee once in a while

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not even worth the price
reviews.reviewText: It looks cute, but that’s about all it’s good for. It’s cheap material, the heating element stopped working a month in, and it’s excessively loud (not good for a calling office). I have only been putting the correct amount of water in so I don’t know what’s going on or why it’s so bad ¯\_(ツ)_/¯. Save up for a keurig if you’re needing a small coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for single family home
reviews.reviewText: Not reasonable if you have a home full of people, more reasonable for a single person home. Very easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Compact
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I asked for this Keurig in pink for my salon as a birthday gift , then months later I purchased a mint green Keurig for my mother as a giftIt is compact , lightweight and portable. I have taken it with me for outdoor backyard functionsVery simple to use, an 8 year can set it up and make hot cocoa, with adult supervision because the water temperature is very hot.This is not high end or fancy, there is no tech involved and the reservoir tank is for one cup at a time .I've bought two because I like the simplicity and the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to work and color is absolutely pink!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great to look at
reviews.reviewText: Great to look at but only marginally functional. Lid is so flexible it will not puncture all pods. Also latch is difficult to get it to catch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and color.
reviews.reviewText: It's prefect and easy to use.
Love the colour and the size very nice
